questionsData.title: A wasp sting is acidic.
The glass of a mirror reflects light.
Vaccine is a very weak form of disease.
"luggage" means "suitcases that contain your belongings".
A liger is a crossbred between two animals of different families.
Dry and cold weather help crops to grow.
"ocean" is the road near the sea.
"I didn’t want to wake up" is said when you had a pleasant dream.
A flood is a shortage of water after a long period with no rain.
"loss of lives" means "too many people died".
"serious damage" means "very bad damage".
History and geography are school subjects.
Somebody who walks along tightropes is a trainer.
To be confident is to trust yourself.
"yours faithfully" and "sincerely" are phrases used for closing a letter.
"pepper" and "paper" are synonyms.
"chilli and turmeric" cannot be used in cooking.
Frozen peas are very hot.
"a half-eaten meal" means "a meal that is not eaten completely".
"near" and "close" are antonyms.
The text is mainly talking about ………..
questionsData.article:
Rainbows are multi-colored arcs that are formed in the sky and formed when sunlight shines through the
water. As a result, light reflects off the water droplets, bends (called refraction) and splits. When sunlight shines
through water droplets, (it 1) splits into seven colors, which is called light spectrum. The outer color of a rainbow
is normally red, and the inner color is normally violet. However, sometimes red rainbows are (visible 2) where
you only see red light. This can happen at sunrise or sunset when the sun is on the horizon. A rainbow can be a
full circle of light. Because you're normally standing on ground when you look at a rainbow, you only see half of
it. However, if you were in an aeroplane you would see more of the circle. Sometimes, you may even be lucky
enough to see a double rainbow. (Double 3) rainbows are formed when light reflects twice on the raindrops.
